traits.name: Barkskin
traits.desc: Sharwyn's AC can't be lower than 16.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Sharwyn has a spell book that contains the spells listed in her Spellcasting trait, plus detect magic and silent image.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: Sharwyn is a 1st-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): light, prestidigitation, ray of frost * 1st level (2 slots): color spray, magic missile, shield, sleep

traits.name: Tree Thrall
traits.desc: If the Gulthias Tree dies, Sharwyn dies 24 hours later.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
